block.p: CHARLOTTE BOBCATS--Named Paul Mokeski assistant coach. INDIANA PACERS--Named Dick Harter, Lester Conner, Frank Vogel, Jay DeFruscio and Dan Burke assistant coaches.

KANSAS CITY CHIEFS--Agreed to terms with WR Brent Little on a two-year contract. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Re-signed DE Bobby McCray. Signed P Adam Podlesh. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Signed WR Paris Hamilton. GIANTS--Signed LB Jessie Armstead to a one-day contract and announced his retirement.

ANAHEIM DUCKS--Signed Randy Carlyle, coach, to a one-year contract extension, through the 2008-09 season. EDMONTON OILERS--Named Jeff Truitt assistant coach for Springfield (AHL). FLORIDA PANTHERS--Re-signed D Bryan Allen to a five-year contract. DEVILS--Signed C Jari Viuhkola, D Andy Greene and D Matthew Corrente.
